record.jsxtip: Fires when the user depresses the mouse button on this splitter. Canceling this event prevents this splitter from resizing.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires when the user releases the mouse button after resizing this splitter.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this splitter is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this splitter before it is removed from the DOM.
